    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94192</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pressure on a drawing pin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Druck auf einem zeichnenden Stift</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pression sur une broche de dessin</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pressão em um pino desenhando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pressione su un perno dissipante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίεση σε μια καρφίτσα σχεδίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Presión en un contacto que traza</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that small pressure or push by the thumb on the drawing pin's head produces a large pressure on the drawing pin's point.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Area</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drawing pin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">notice-board</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thumb</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt diesen kleinen Druck, oder 
Stoß durch den Daumen auf dem zeichnenden Kopf des Stiftes produziert
einen großen Druck im zeichnenden Punkt des Stiftes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre cette petite 
pression ou la poussée par le pouce sur la tête de la broche de 
dessin produit une grande pression sur le point de la broche de 
dessin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra essa pressão pequena 
ou o impulso pelo polegar na cabeça do pino desenhando produz uma 
pressão grande no ponto do pino desenhando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra quella piccola 
pressione o la spinta dal pollice sulla testa del perno dissipante 
produce una grande pressione sul punto del perno dissipante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι η μικρή πίεση ή 
η ώθηση από τον αντίχειρα στο κεφάλι της καρφίτσας σχεδίων 
παράγει μια μεγάλη πίεση στο σημείο της καρφίτσας σχεδίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra esa presión pequeña
o el empuje por el pulgar en la pista del contacto que traza produce 
una presión grande en la punta del contacto que traza.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zeichnender Stift</string>
          </keyword>
